1010100000110000 0110010100100101 1 -> sum: 0000110101010110, cout: 1
1000110011010101 0000110110110100 1 -> sum: 1001101010001010, cout: 0
0010001001110110 1111110110001111 0 -> sum: 0010000000000101, cout: 1
1100011110101111 0100010101010000 0 -> sum: 0000110011111111, cout: 1
0010101011100100 0100110100111100 0 -> sum: 0111100000100000, cout: 0
0111010011101011 1000101100010011 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
